valid_email_trigger.snippet: Create a workflow that syncs HubSpot deals to Asana projects
valid_email_trigger.subject: [WORKFLOW] HubSpot to Asana Integration
valid_email_trigger.text:
[BRIEF]
I need a workflow that monitors HubSpot for new deals in 'Closed Won' stage and automatically creates corresponding projects in Asana with all deal details.

Requirements:
- Trigger on deal stage change
- Extract deal name, amount, company
- Create Asana project with custom fields
- Notify team via Slack
[END]

Best regards,
John Doe

email_with_signature.subject: [WORKFLOW] Customer Onboarding Automation
email_with_signature.text:
Hi,

I need a workflow for customer onboarding.

When a new customer signs up in Stripe, I want to:
1. Create a record in Airtable
2. Send welcome email
3. Add to Mailchimp list
4. Create tasks in ClickUp for account setup

Thanks!

--
Sarah Johnson
CEO, Startup Inc.
sarah@startup.com
+1-555-0123
Sent from my iPhone
email_with_signature.snippet: I need a workflow for customer onboarding...
